data.title: BC Ferries Vacations
data.meta_description: Get details and book an activity for your next coastal BC getaway with BC Ferries Vacations.
data.text:
Feel the wind in your hair and water splash on your face as you take a thrilling simulation flight from coast to coast across Canada, all without leaving the comfort of your seat on Canada’s ultimate flying ride – FlyOver Canada.

Highlights:

An inspiring audio-visual pre-show to get you ready for your flight.

Be whisked away on an exhilarating ride that stimulates all of your senses.

Hang suspended with your feet dangling in front of a 20 m spherical screen.

Feel the sensation of flying over some of Canada’s most spectacular sights –from icebergs offshore Newfoundland, to Niagara Falls, across the Prairies, over iconic lakes, cityscapes, glaciers, snow-capped Rocky Mountains, to the West Coast.

This ride is well worth a visit to see all of Canada in just 25 minutes.

Location: 201-999 Canada Place, Vancouver, BC V6C 3E1.

Please present your printed voucher to a FlyOver Canada on-site ticket booth to get your ticket issued.

Height restriction: all passengers must be 102 cm in order to enjoy this attraction (in general 4 years and older).

Safety: While FlyOver Canada is a gently thrilling simulation ride, expectant mothers and guests with the following conditions should not ride: fear of heights or susceptibility to motion sickness, heart conditions, chronic back or neck pain, conditions aggravated by visual stimuli, such as epilepsy.

Baggage: large bags may be dropped off at the Guest Services desk, as large items cannot be taken onto the ride.
